name: Audit Name
surgery: Is reasons for visit and diagnosis recorded in EMR?
diagnostic: Does the discharge process checklist assess transportation needs (Daycare, ED, IPD)?

vulnerab: Is the care plan documentation available?
social: Is fall risk reassessment completed in every shift?
spiritual: Is handover during inter-department transfer documented?
risk: Is MEWS monitoring in wards done as per policy?
care: Is pain reassessment recorded, if applicable?
pfe: Is risk of self-harm assessment documented, if applicable?

facility_communicated: Is the care plan documentation available?
health_education: Is fall risk assessment completed within 2 hours of admission?

bystander: Is pain screening done during initial assessment?

wound: Is the care plan documentation available?

cooked_food_cooling: Is screening for abuse and neglect during initial assessment documented?
food_portioning: Is screening for alcohol or drug dependency during initial assessment documented?
ab2: Is fall risk reassessment completed every shift for post-surgery patients?
ab3: Are vitals monitored in PACU recorded?
ab4: Is pain reassessment recorded, if applicable?
ab5: Is procedure safety checklist documented outside OT (e.g., Endoscopy, ENT, OPD Procedure Room, Radiology, Urology)?
ab6: Does the sedation documentation include pre-sedation assessment?
ab7: Does the sedation documentation include pre-sedation assessment and monitoring during endoscopy, ED, or ICU?
ab13: Is Patient Condition at Discharge recorded?
ab16: Is it ensured that no abbreviations are used?
ab21: Is Pre and Post-Operative Checklist completed?
ab32: Is End of Life (EOL) care documented?
ab44: Is Planned Length of Stay (LOS) documented?
ab45: Is Actual Length of Stay (LOS) documented?
ab51: Is Post Operative Care Plan documented?
ab52: Is MEWS (Modified Early Warning Score) assessment done?
ab53: Is ABC (Airway, Breathing, Circulation) check completed?
ab55: Are Lines and Tubes checked and documented?
ab74: Are Start and End Date with Time documented?
ab77: Is Sign-In Date and Time recorded?
ab79: Is Time-Out Date and Time documented?
ab81: Is Sign-Out Date and Time recorded?
ab85: Is Sign-In Date and Time recorded?
ab87: Is Time-Out Date and Time recorded?
ab89: Is Sign-Out Date and Time recorded?
ab90: Are Count and Specimen details documented?
ab103: Is ASA (American Society of Anesthesiologists) classification documented?
ab104: Are Intra-Procedural Vitals monitored and recorded?
ab108: Is NIHSS score documented in initial notes (ED/IP)?
ab109: Is Initial GRBS documented at admission?
ab110: Are Consent forms for IV Thrombolysis / Mechanical Thrombectomy completed?
ab111: Is Informed Refusal form documented (if applicable)?
ab113: Does the record contain admission reasons, assessments, diagnosis, investigations, procedures, monitoring, and care details?
ab114: Is documentation provided if an eligible ischemic stroke patient did not receive IV thrombolytic therapy?
ab115: Is Pre-morbid mRS documented in all initial IP notes?
ab116: Are key infection control indicators defined and measured (Hand Hygiene, CAUTI, CLABSI, VAP, SSI)?
ab117: Are all assessments documented and signed/authenticated by staff?
ab118: Do assessments result in appropriate care/monitoring plans that are documented?
ab119: Is Dysphagia Screening documented before starting oral feeds?
ab120: Is Nutritional Screening documented for all patients?
ab121: Is Care guided by functional assessment and periodic reassessments documented?
ab122: Are Assessments completed within 24 hours of admission or once patient is stable?
ab123: Does the Discharge/Treatment summary include instructions for urgent care?
ab124: Are NIHSS / mRS scores documented at discharge?
ab125: In case of death, does the record include a Death Summary?
ab126: Is there missing or incomplete documentation related to Medico-Legal Case (MLC)?
ab127: Does the record reflect accurate and timely documentation of death details (cause, date, time, EMR status updated to 'Deceased')?
